mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_article_comments WHERE article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT sys_article_comments_id AS sysArticleCommentsId, article_comments_content AS articleCommentsContent, article_id AS articleId, a.sys_user_id AS sysUserId, sys_user_nickname AS sysUserNickname, sys_user_icon AS sysUserIcon, a.created, a.updated FROM sys_article_comments AS a, sys_user AS b WHERE a.sys_user_id = b.sys_user_id AND article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY a.created DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_article_comments ( article_comments_content, article_id, sys_user_id, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{entity.articleCommentsContent}, #{entity.articleId}, #{entity.sysUserId}, #{entity.created}, #{entity.updated} )
